column5: TRQ Financials here are super solid Low amount of debt Increasing earnings Safety of workers is at a milestone low Price of gold is increasing Only hurdles left to overcome are the completion of the power plant and to iron out the issues raised by the Mongolian parliamentary working group in their latest letter Everyone involved will make an insane amount of money once this all gets settled The Mongolian government and workers have so much to gain from a beneficial relationship with Turquoise And when China and the US squash their trade war this stock will be worth double
